title.zh: 宁波：科学治疗 规范为先

subtitle.zh: 血友病规范治疗巡讲活动

description.zh: 血友病规范治疗巡讲活动在宁波举行。左钰洁以“女性血友病携带者为何也会患血友病？解密基因表达”为题，展开公益科普宣讲，向参与者讲解女性血友病携带者和患者的相关知识。
description.en: Hemophilia standardized treatment lecture tour was held in Ningbo. Yujie (Ruby) Zuo gave a public welfare science lecture titled 'Why Can Female Hemophilia Carriers Also Develop Hemophilia? Decoding Gene Expression', explaining knowledge about female hemophilia carriers and patients to participants.

title.zh: 血友病规范治疗巡讲活动视频
title.en: Hemophilia Standardized Treatment Lecture Tour Video
